Literature.Title: Isolation of a variant of subtilosin A with hemolytic activity.
Literature.Author: Huang T, Geng H, Miyyapuram VR, Sit CS, Vederas JC, Nakano MM

Literature.Title: The Natural Antimicrobial Subtilosin A Synergizes with Lauramide Arginine Ethyl Ester (LAE), ε-Poly-L-lysine (Polylysine), Clindamycin Phosphate and Metronidazole, Against the Vaginal Pathogen Gardnerella vaginalis
Literature.Author: Cavera VL, Volski A, Chikindas ML

Literature.Title: Antiherpes simplex virus type 2 activity of the antimicrobial peptide subtilosin
Literature.Author: Quintana VM, Torres NI, Wachsman MB, Sinko PJ, Castilla V, Chikindas ML

Literature.Title: Safety, formulation, and in vitro antiviral activity of the antimicrobial peptide subtilosin against herpes simplex virus type 1
Literature.Author: Torres NI, Noll KS, Xu S, Li J, Huang Q, Sinko PJ, Wachsman MB, Chikindas ML

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Rabbit erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=>250 µM,Vero cells:50% Cytotoxicity=314-316.8 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis JH642(MIC=250µM),Bacillus anthracis Sterne 7702(MIC=16µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10987(MIC=40µM),Bacillus thuringiensis NRRL -B4039(MIC=40µM),Enterococcus faecalis V583(MIC=100µM),Staphylococcus carnosus pCX15(MIC=100µM),Listeria monocytogenes F4244(MIC=40µM),Streptococcus pyogenes MGAS 5005(MIC=100µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(no activity data),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus RN6390(no activity data),Gardnerella vaginalis ATCC 14018(MIC=12µg/ml),Lactobacillus gasseri ATCC 33323(MIC=825µg/ml),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum ATCC 39268(MIC=785µg/ml),Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 4356(MIC=1000µg/ml),Limosilactobacillus vaginalis ATCC 49540(MIC=725µg/ml),HSV-2(IC90 REP=25µg/ml),HSV-2(90-100% REP=200µg/ml),HSV-2(EC50=18.2µg/ml),HSV-1(IC50 REP=9.6µg/ml),HSV-1(IC90 REP=12µg/ml),HSV-1(90-100% REP=100µg/ml),HSV-1(EC50=9.6µg/ml)
